attributes.action: Raise the voting age back up to 18
attributes.additional_details: I believe the UK government should not allow children to decide the country’s future before finishing formal education
attributes.background: I believe Parliament should raise the voting age back as children should not be able to decide the country’s future before finishing formal education

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733604
